person.persName: Lorenzo Thomas (Civil War Union Brigadier General.)

body.p: Born on Oct. 26, 1804 in New Castle, Delaware. Married to Elizabeth Thomas. Children included Lorenzo. In 1823, he graduated from the US Military Academy, saw action in the Seminole War and served as General William O. Butler's chief of staff in the Mexican War. At the outbreak of the Civil War, he was named Adjutant General and promoted Brigadier General, in March 1863. Died on February 2, 1875 in Washington D.C.
